content.title: Care Ministries
content.description: Healing and care ministries at The Meeting House.

image1.alt: A woman is smiling and talking to a close friend at the kitchen counter.

content.text1: We want to position and empower people to receive the love, care, forgiveness, equipping, and healing they need to fully thrive in following Jesus. Scroll down to view all our care ministries.

A group-based, Christ-centred journey that leads participants to address unhealthy behaviours, attend to emotional upheaval, expose false beliefs, and ease deep emotional and spiritual wounds in a confidential and safe environment.

image1.alt: A young man standing outside in front of a waterfall.

list.title: Stephen Ministry
list.text: Trained caregivers are here to journey with you through life's most difficult seasons. This partnership is designed around weekly one-on-one meetings, with other touchpoints through the week. Click here to connect with a Stephen Minister today.

list.title: Divorce Care
list.text: Led by others who have successfully recovered from divorce, this friendly, caring group will journey alongside you through one of lifeâ€™s most difficult experiences. Click here to email a Divorce Care leader and get connected.

list.title: Parenting Teens & Tweens
list.text: Join our seasoned facilitators and other parents as we dive into a broad array of topics affecting parents and their teens today. Click here to email the leader and learn how you can participate.
list.imageAlt: Two mothers discussing their children over coffee.

list.title: The Marriage Course
list.text: This course is for couples who want to make a good marriage better, those struggling with some area of their relationship, and those thinking about getting married. Click here to email the marriage course leader today.

content.text1: A live zoom prayer event every Sunday morning at 11:00am EDT. Prayer Team members provide caring, confidential prayer support.

image1.alt: A group of people together on a zoom call.

content.text1: Intercessors bring the needs of others to God. They pray for individuals, groups, the church at home and abroad, and specific needs as they come up. Click the link below to email your prayer.
